The About page

About

Ungainly is a professional experiment (designing imperfection) of Csongor Bartus in web design and development.
You can learn more about me on my blog or twitter.

Unlike other web designers I have a different approach for a better overall experience both for us but mostly for your customers.

  Ungainly The classic way
Attention span Always working on a single project Working with many projects and customers and switching them frequently
Mockups and wireframes Live HTML prototypes for live feedback Photoshop templates which will always look different live on the web
Device compatibility Smartphone, tablet and desktop One design fits them all. The final results ignores the mobile web
Style Original, unique, never seen before Mainstream, trendy, boring
Rates and delivery time Lower rates, delivery in 1-2 months Higher rates, delivery in days and weeks

Pricing

Our monthly 4,000 usd rate is very performant. Read about why.
